languages.text: "Простительная нехватка прозорливости... для какого-нибудь чиновника {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}. Но не для Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Простительная нехватка прозорливости для столь молодого Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「洞察力の不足であれば大目に見ることもできよう…これが{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}員ならな。だが、自由開拓者は違う」
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「洞察力の不足であれば大目に見ることもできよう…これが{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}行政局{/g}員ならな。だが、自由開拓者は違う」

languages.text: “如果是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的官僚……或许可以一时失察，但行商浪人绝不该如此盲目。”
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “如果是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的官僚……或许可以一时失察，但行商浪人绝不该如此盲目。”

languages.text: «Un descuido excusable... para un funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Pero no para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Un descuido excusable... para un funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Pero no para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: « Un manque de clairvoyance pardonnable... pour un agent de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, mais pas pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Un manque de clairvoyance pardonnable... pour un agent de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}, mais pas pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Ein verzeihlicher Mangel an Einsicht ... für {mf|einen Beamten|eine Beamtin} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Aber nicht für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ein verzeihlicher Mangel an Einsicht ... für {mf|einen Beamten|eine Beamtin} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum{/g}Administratum. Aber nicht für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibi olsan affedebilirdim ama Hür Tacir'e yaraşmayan bir idrak eksikliği bu."
languages.original_text: "A forgivable lack of insight... for an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk. But not for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibi olsan affedilebilirdi ama Hür Tacir'e yakışmayacak bir idrak eksikliği bu."
